response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that set it apart. I believe this investment will provide you with significant returns and enhance your experience. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
